#  constant_values.txt
#  Created on {2008, 1, 21, 9, 11, 57.208120}
#
   1/Pi   = 0.31830988618379067154
     Pi/4 = 0.78539816339744830962
     Pi/2 = 1.5707963267948966192
     Pi   = 3.1415926535897932385
   2*Pi   = 6.2831853071795864769
Sqrt[Pi]  = 1.7724538509055160273
Sqrt[2]   = 1.4142135623730950488
Sqrt[3]   = 1.7320508075688772935
Sqrt[5]   = 2.2360679774997896964
Cos[Pi/6] = 0.86602540378443864676
Cos[Pi/4] = 0.70710678118654752440
    E     = 2.7182818284590452354
(1+Sqrt[5])/2 = 1.6180339887498948482
EulerGamma = 0.57721566490153286061
